original_text: These are now the chief of their fathers, and this is the genealogy of them that went up with me from Babylon, in the reign of Artaxerxes the king.
korean_text: 아닥사스다 왕이 왕위에 있을 때에 나와 함께 바벨론에서 올라온 족장들과 그들의 계보는 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: These are now the chief of their fathers
and this is the genealogy of them
that went up with me from Babylon
in the reign of Artaxerxes the king
